gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T extends ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphiteReporter.Builder, InfluxDBReporter.Builder, MetricReportReporter.Builder, OutputStreamReporter.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    ConfiguredScheduledReporter

    public abstract static class ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T extends ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T>>
extends Object
    Builder for ConfiguredScheduledReporter. Defaults to no filter, reporting rates in seconds and times in milliseconds.
